seo.title: Nextjs and React Native development | Pixel on Pixel
seo.description: I'm a Nextjs, Storybook developer, get in touch here.

introduction.heading: Frontend and React Native Development
introduction.body: I'm work on frontend with React, Nextjs, Storybook and am migrating into app development with React Native. I'm an Upwork rising talent with hundreds of billed hours.

featuredWorkHeader.heading: Featured Work
featuredWorkHeader.body: A handpicked assortment of my latest work, these projects underscore my commitment to delivering outstanding frontend solutions, employing the most current skills and expertise in the field.

featuredWork.title: Tropic Labs
featuredWork.description: Tropic Labs, a luxury sunscreen company, needed their vibrant design meticulously implemented into a high-performance, headless Shopify platform. This approach successfully optimised PageSpeed scores without sacrificing any of Shopify's robust functionalities. The site was meticulously built using an advanced tech stack that included React, TypeScript, Tailwind, and Prismic Headless CMS.
featuredWork.descriptionExtended:
To enrich the user experience, the site integrated Shopify's customer accounts, checkout, and authentication features. Additionally, integration with Stamped reviews was implemented, fostering trust and enhancing user engagement through direct customer feedback.

All project components were developed in Storybook, which facilitated efficient testing and collaboration with external design teams. This streamlined approach ensured seamless ongoing development, review, and maintainability across teams.

featuredWork.title: Freshy's Baking Club
featuredWork.description: Freshy's Baking Club, a bespoke custom cake business, required a dynamic, mobile-first presence page that was meticulously crafted to showcase their distinctive brand. This project, built using Sketch, React, Javascript, Stitches and Storybook, delivered a seamless, user-friendly experience across all devices.
featuredWork.descriptionExtended:
The design, which focused on perfect adaptation to smaller screens, was complemented by the integration of Vimeo, enriching the site with interactive video elements.

As part of the project's ongoing development, plans are in place for further CMS integration, conversion to TypeScript, and the incorporation of Tailwind CSS, all aimed at delivering even more refined user interfaces and interactions.

featuredWork.title: Boss Personal Planner
featuredWork.description: Boss Personal Planner required a dynamic e-commerce presence for selling their digital and paper planners. This project was crafted as a headless Shopify site, integrating an array of modern technologies including Shopify, React, Javascript, Gatsby, and Storybook.
featuredWork.descriptionExtended:
The site incorporates Prismic headless CMS for easy content updates, ensuring the site remains current and engaging. To enhance customer interaction, it integrates Shopify's customer accounts, authentication features and incorporates recurring subscription services, ensuring seamless transactions for loyal customers.

Storybook was utilised for component presentation, demonstrating the project's maintainability and future scalability.

previousWorkHeader.heading: Previous Work
previousWorkHeader.body: These projects highlight some of my earlier experience with Shopify 1.0 and WordPress development. Although the technology stack has since evolved and I no longer maintain these sites, they remain active and provide insight into my capabilities as a frontend developer.

feedbackHeader.heading: 5-Star Verified Feedback
feedbackHeader.body: A few comments from my Upwork reviews.

feedback.title: Shopify Theme Development
feedback.body: Brett is awesome and a pleasure to do business with. He is a total pro and comes without the hassles of many freelancers out there. I will definitely continue to work with Brett in the future.

feedback.title: Product Funnel Pages
feedback.body: Brett is awesome and we will continue to work with him.

feedback.title: Shopify Theme Development
feedback.body: I very much appreciate Brett's efforts. He is a gem and very much look forward to the next project.

feedback.title: A+ Shopify Develompent
feedback.body: Solid work and good problem solving. Will be working with Brett again going forward.

feedback.title: Frontend Development
feedback.body: Brett is great and we'll continue to use him as an ongoing resource. Thanks to Brett for providing a 'grandfathered' rate to us. Much appreciated.

feedback.title: Shopify Frontend Additions
feedback.body: Brett's a pro. We definitely plan on continuing to use his services with all Shopify and Wordpress opportunities.

services.body: My adaptable workflow caters to both solo and collaborative settings, seamlessly accommodating clients in any time zone. Whether your project demands a Shopify specialist or a skilled React developer, you can trust in my expertise and dedication to deliver results.

list.name: Headless Frontend Mastery:
list.description: Proficient in React/Next.js front-end development, ensuring cutting-edge and responsive solutions for your projects.

list.name: Shopify 2.0 Expertise:
list.description: Skilled in Shopify 2.0 theme conversion and development, providing seamless upgrades and enhanced functionality for your storefront.

list.name: Storybook Excellence:
list.description: Experienced in utilizing Storybook for component documentation, simplifying large project maintainability  across teams.

contact.heading: Let's talk about your project
contact.body: I'm excited to discuss your ideas and bring your digital vision to fruition. Feel free to reach out.
